mapper.select: SELECT f.feed_id, f.contents, f.location, f.created_at, f.writer_user_id, u.uid AS writerUid, u.nick_name AS writerNickName, u.pic AS writerPic, -- 내가 쓴 게시물 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feed WHERE writer_user_id = #{signedUserId}) AS feedCount, -- 내가 누른 좋아요 총 개수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM feed_like WHERE user_id = #{signedUserId}) AS allFeedLikeCount FROM feed_like fl JOIN feed f ON fl.feed_id = f.feed_id JOIN user u ON u.user_id = f.writer_user_id WHERE fl.user_id = #{signedUserId} ORDER BY f.feed_id DESC LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{size};
